I believe it would greatly benefit you and enhance your experience. Given its quality and the value it brings, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects the exceptional features and benefits of the product while allowing you to enjoy significant savings compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
